translations: n.电报（指通信方式）；电报机；（运动比赛得分或其他信息的）显示板
v.发电报，用电报发送（信息）；流露，透露（计划或意图）

sentences.sentence: Now I must telegraph your father to come.
sentences.translation: 现在我必须发电报叫你父亲来。

sentences.sentence: A new telegraph line has been set up between the two cities.
sentences.translation: 那两个城市之间架设了一条新的电报线。

sentences.sentence: The telegraph, the telephone, and radio were the obvious predecessors of the Internet, iPods, and mobile phones.
sentences.translation: 电报、电话和无线电显然是互联网、iPods 和移动电话的前身。
